text:

TCP/8009 ajp port.

following problem occurs:

In previous analyses I noticed that packages TCP that leave the application
servers go with “checksum incorrect”, but the same door 8080 HTTP happens when use.

This is almost certainly an issue with your firewall dropping idle connections.
Please use the Tomcat users list for further assistance.
